About Me

My Story

I'm a self-taught developer who believes in learning by building. While I don't have a traditional computer science degree, I've developed my skills through hands-on projects, online resources, and a commitment to continuous learning.

What started as curiosity about how websites work has grown into a passion for creating solutions that solve real problems. I approach each project as an opportunity to learn something new and improve my craft.

What Drives Me

I'm motivated by the challenge of turning complex problems into simple, elegant solutions. I believe the best way to learn is by building, failing, iterating, and improving. Every project teaches me something new about both technology and problem-solving.

I'm currently exploring opportunities where I can contribute to meaningful projects while continuing to grow as a developer. I'm particularly interested in roles where I can learn from experienced teams and make a tangible impact.

Technical Skills

JavaScript HTML & CSS React Node.js Git & GitHub Astro Responsive Design

Currently Learning

  • TypeScript
  • API Development
  • Database Design
